title: Part One: The Not-At-All-Sad History of Libertarian Sea Nations
itunes:title: Part One: The Not-At-All-Sad History of Libertarian Sea Nations
description:
Robert is joined by David Bell to discuss the history of Libertarian Boat Cities.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. https://thebaffler.com/salvos/the-billionaires-fantasia
  2. https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2020/jun/24/seasteading-a-vanity-project-for-the-rich-or-the-future-of-humanity
  3. https://www.theguardian.com/world/2000/may/06/duncancampbell
  4. https://www.wired.com/1997/10/a-boat-a-city-and-a-high-tech-waterworld/
  5. https://inthesetimes.com/article/floating-utopias
  6. https://www.independent.co.uk/arts-entertainment/prince-lazarus-rules-the-waves-1157051.html
  7. https://theweek.com/articles/482427/libertarian-island-billionaires-utopia
  8. https://www.hakaimagazine.com/features/the-quest-for-a-floating-utopia/
  9. https://www.theguardian.com/news/2021/sep/07/disastrous-voyage-satoshi-cryptocurrency-cruise-ship-seassteading
  10. https://www.seasteading.org/convert-cruise-ships-to-seasteads/
